name: PIP-show/gif
description: A gif of an online video exhibition in 2020 where I presented 10 drawings simply by stacking them in front of a camera. The video and some more info about the making of these drawings can be found here: https://hansup.be/2020_PIP_online-exhibition_hans-verhaegen.html Drawings as trips in search of surprise.  Hans Verhaegen, 2021 – www.hansup.be – @hansup
